title: Storytelling
creator_credit: Michael Milan and Audio Visual Learning Centre, University of Otago
brief_description: Elizabeth Miller, Young People’s Librarian at the Invercargill Public Library, New Zealand discusses her approach to the craft of storytelling: and demonstrates with a group of pre-schoolers and a class of 9-10 year olds. Suitable for tertiary level.
